definitions.definition: Having a ready flow of words but lacking thought or understanding; superficial ; shallow.
Artfully persuasive  but insincere in nature; smooth-talking , honey-tongued , silver-tongued .
examples: a glib tongue; a glib speech

definitions.definition: Snarky or unserious in a disrespectful way.

main_definition: Having a ready flow of words but lacking thought or understanding; superficial ; shallow.
secondary_definitions: Artfully persuasive  but insincere in nature; smooth-talking , honey-tongued , silver-tongued .
Snarky or unserious in a disrespectful way.
